tooltip: Select Yaraxonal as your hero of choice.

heroSelectionDescriptionElements.tooltipText: Yaraxonal focuses on improving Gymnasia units.
Allows you to summon Yaraxonal, an swift Melee hero armed with two Khopesh swords.
Ranged unit that can stun enemies.
Legendary level units have a small chance to avoid death blows.
Gymnasia units can now gain levels.
